Class WebUserServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.net.login.WebUserServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserServer

    public class WebUserServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserServer
    A user server that automatically picks the best protocol for a URL.
    Author:
    Tomaso2468
